items.description: Brand Identity Package - logo design, color palette, typography system
Website Design - homepage, about, services, contact (desktop + mobile)
Business Card Design - front and back, print-ready files
Letterhead and Envelope Design - coordinated stationery set
Social Media Templates - Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter (12 templates)
Brand Guidelines Document - 24-page PDF with usage rules
Icon Set Design - custom icons for website and presentations
Email Signature Template - HTML email signature with logo
Photography Art Direction - on-site creative direction (per day)
Print Collateral - brochure design, tri-fold, print-ready
Revision Rounds - additional revision cycles beyond scope

paymentTerms: Net 30. Payment due within 30 days of invoice date. A late fee of 1.5% per month will be applied to overdue balances. Please remit payment via bank transfer or check to the address above.
notes: Thank you for choosing Northwind Design. We enjoyed working on the Meridian rebrand and look forward to the next phase. Please reach out with any questions about the deliverables.
